name: Evergy, Inc.
description: Evergy, Inc. is a utility company that provides electricity to approximately 1.6 million customers in Kansas and Missouri. Formed in 2018 through the merger of Westar Energy and Great Plains Energy, Evergy is committed to delivering reliable, affordable, and sustainable energy solutions. The company focuses on clean energy generation, with a significant portion of its electricity sourced from renewable resources, including wind and solar power. Evergy's mission is to empower the communities it serves by providing safe and dependable energy while also investing in infrastructure to enhance service reliability. The company places a strong emphasis on environmental stewardship, aiming to reduce carbon emissions and promote energy efficiency. Evergy is also actively engaged in supporting economic growth and community development initiatives within its service areas. With a dedication to sustainability and innovation, Evergy is well-positioned to meet the evolving energy needs of its customers in a changing energy landscape.
